pages.text: When your regular-grade machines just aren't cutting it anymore, try an $(2)MKII Machine.$() These powerhouses are improvements on the standard machines in every way:$(li)Double the upgrade slots, for a total of 6!$(li)Faster processing!$(li)Two processing channels at once!$(li)And many more!$(br)But, don't take my word for it:

pages.title: MKII P. Compressor
pages.text: The MKII Pneumatic Compressor has a special property in that it stores internally all of the available molds, for quick & easy hot-swapping within the machine.
The MKII Grinder, for recipes which have a chance to double the output, increases this chance twofold. For example, A recipe with a chance-to-double of 25% becomes $(6)50%$() in the MKII Grinder.
The MKII Lumber Mill will output Sawdust twice as often as its standard counterpart. Warped Sawdust appears 10% of the time, so it will show up $(6)20%$() of the time in this.

pages.title: In-Place Upgrading
pages.text: Crafting isn't the only way to upgrade to MKII. Read on to learn how to use an $(1)MKII Upgrade Kit$() in order to upgrade without removing your block from the world.
